entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False IDE0059 message #64198
  • Switch pattern matching with throwing default returns object with wrong boxed datatype #64196
  • Tests failing due to MessagePack on 32-bit debug builds only #64195
  • Create email aliases for specific infraswat roles #64191
    17.5
  • An assert is thrown for an erroneous code using out var #64189
  • Update vs to Version 17.4.0 Preview 2.0 from PREVIEW 1 cause errors in publish worker service #64184
  • IntelliSense doesn't work for interface statics when dotting a type parameter #64182
  • Compiler unnecessarily guards readonly object when locking. #64178
  • [Proposal] Extensions to `file_header_template` in EditorConfig #64177
  • Source generator exceptions should be shown as errors, rather than warnings #64175
  • Lack of a fresh Roslyn version in the Mono project #64174
  • Confusing error message mentioning `WindowsRuntime` when trying to await an `IAsyncEnumerable` #64170
  • [LSP] Document highlighting throws exception with F# files #64169
  • [LSP] Enable support for F# semantic classifications #64168

Closed

  • Change RTRS default escape to ReturnOnly #64122
    17.4
  • Generator types are sometimes being loaded twice #63189
    17.4
  • "Scoped" word is forbidden since MSBuild version 17.3.0+92e077650 #63469
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/solutionEvents #64202
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `[module: RefSafetyRules]` attribute only if the module contains type declarations #64201
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Add ScopedKind to IParameterSymbol and ILocalSymbol #64190
    Area-Compilers
  • Update localization-suggestion.md #64187
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use warnings for escape analysis in unsafe context #64186
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix confusing `ref` usage error messages #64183
    Area-Compilers
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce GetTypeByMetadataName allocations for fail-path #64176
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Try to reduce JIT costs for AbstractLogAggregator #64172
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove the ILegacyWorkspaceDescriptor concept #64161
    Area-IDE
  • Skip some tests that are currently failing on debug 32-bit #64199
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64197
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change RSTE of RTRS to ReturnOnly by default #64152
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Switch to main thread before calling TryApplyChanges #64194
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review, 17.4
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64167
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix CI badges #64193
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix regression in error list updates #64180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64185
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators, Next
  • Fix parsing of lambda parameter named "scoped" #64085
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cherrypick for 17.3: Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #64159
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64165
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to messagepack serialization/deserialization for our ID types #64135
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add multiple language support to stack trace explorer #64204
    Area-IDE
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce the new EA extensibility points for UnitTesting to actually implement/export to light up in the forked solution crawler. #64164
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler outputs #63882
    Area-Compilers
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Add a completion list filter for enum member #64054
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Diagnostics TaggerDelay #56354
    Area-IDE
  • Utilise `PooledObjects.ArrayList(Of T)' in Features\LanguageServices #55988
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • don't run compiler-only tests unless there is a compiler change #64163
    Area-Infrastructure
